numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a pattern in the world.
2. People who are between 15 years and 24 years are more positive about future generations than people who are over 40 years.
3. I wonder why Mali is very negative for both age groups.
4. I ask whether people in Mali live in the past.
5. I ask whether people in Mali do not have electricity.
7. Many people in my area believe that the world is getting better.
8. Some people in my area disagree.
9. The title for the graph is "Generation Battle: Is the World Getting Better or Worse?".
